WALK TO ELITE SCHOOLS, SHOPS AND PARKS

REGISTRATION REQUIRED PRIOR TO INSPECTION.

Entertain year round with a massive under-roofline pavilion and fully decked alfresco with cooling fans overlooking blissful and expansive gardens, primed for children to explore. Glass balustrades make this a superb setting to supervise and showcase the uninterrupted outlook.

Huge under-house storage area and ability to convert this to an extra indoor party space are further exciting opportunities for family.
